The Gunn Robotics Team is always in need of support, and we greatly appreciate any help you can give us.

Financial Donations If you have the financial means to do so, we greatly appreciate your monetary support. your donation helps cover purchasing and mainenance of equipment and tools, materials, and costs associated with competition. To donate, there are several options:

On paper, please make checks payable to our volunteer boosters organization:
    Gunn Robotics Team Boosters
    780 Arastradero Rd.
    Palo Alto, CA, 94306

Online, please visit our Bright Funds site to donate.

If you want to see your donation in action, please feel free to stop by the shop (room L-5 at Gunn High School) for a tour! To set up a time, please email us at gunnrobotics192@gmail.com.

Other Ways to Help: If you do not have financial means to contribute to the team but would like to help in another way, please send us an email at the address mentioned above or visit us in L-5 at Gunn High School to find out other wasy to fill our needs. If you have experience working in machine shops, engineering, computer science, or with an organization like FIRST, please let us know! We would love to have your expertise. Thank you!
